Description: Fragment of strap handle at neck join, with gradual curve, of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown; washy slip. Irregular stamp.
Type series: KT1913 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (288)
